title: Maps Assignment
info: Autos are impossible because of poor assignment design (sorry!) but there's a test script that you can run to see output from a couple of sample problems. That output should tell you most of what you need to know. Note: for the 'properly builds graph' item you can just give them full points if the tests mostly run.

tests.name: Properly builds graph from input data
Strong connectivity test (check last 3 example outputs)
Dijkstra's algorithm (check outputs vs. known best)
Handles input correctly (free unless you did something weird)
